name: This website
desc: Small template with builder for static web page generation.

name: moe-counter-remade
desc: My FastAPI driven rewrite of ```gh('journey-ad/Moe-counter')```. Currently not hosted.

name: Shared-Java
desc: Some of my shared java code (but NOT minecraft related). Contains tuples (for 1, 2 and 3 elements) and delegating realization of Collections.

name: Bon2Gradle
desc: Plugin for Minecraft Dev projects that allows use BON2 as analog of fg.deobf from ForgeGradle.

name: MCInGameTester
desc: Engine for tests, that requires minecraft to be loaded.

name: MJUtils
desc: My Minecraft library with boilerplate code for mod creating. Main features is modular mod load system, annotation based configurations, more features like as Pos (BlockBos backport). Currently being actively rewritten and supplemented.

name: ThaumOres
desc: Small mod adds Thaumcraft's shards ore to generation of the End, the Nether and Overworld's bedrock layer.

name: RealisticBrewingStand
desc: Little logical fix (in render) of the brewing stand from Minecraft.
